name: pandocplay
description: Run pandoc selected text and code block

Pandocplay.Pandoc.workdir.description: Workdir to run Pandoc. Default is current dir.

Followings are available in Pandoc 2.9.2. commonmark, creole, csv, docbook, docx, dokuwiki, epub, fb2, gfm, haddock, html, ipynb, jats, jira, json, latex, man, markdown, markdown_github, markdown_mmd, markdown_phpextra, markdown_strict, mediawiki, muse, native, odt, opml, org, rst, t2t, textile, tikiwiki, twiki, vimwiki.

Pandocplay.output.to.markdownDescription: Output file format. Pandocplay.output.pane.description: Pandoc's output will be shown in OUTPUT pane.

Pandocplay.output.text.Add.description: Pandoc's output will be added after cursor.
